C

com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test
This package contains the unit tests for the Maven Mojo classes.

S

setUp() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test.TestMojo
Create the test fixtures including the CRX mojo and a mocked the Maven project model and Maven project helper.

T

TestMojo - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test
Unit test the CRXMojo class.
TestMojo() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test.TestMojo
 
testMojo() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test.TestMojo
Verify that a .crx file can be created without a pemPassword or classifier property.
testMojoFailsWithoutManifest() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test.TestMojo
Verify that an exception is thrown if there is no manifest file in the source directory.
testMojoWhenPEMFileDoesNotExist() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test.TestMojo
Verify that an exception is raised when trying to sign a .crx file with a nonexistent PEM file.
testMojoWhenPEMFileIsCorrupted() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test.TestMojo
Verify that an exception is raised when trying to sign a .crx file with a corrupted PEM file.
testMojoWithClassifier() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test.TestMojo
Verify that a .crx file can be created without a classifier property.
testMojoWithPasssword() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.test.TestMojo
Verify that a .crx file can be created with a pemPassword but without a classifier property.
